sourceDesc.p: Generated from the Microsoft Word Document Books I've Read 1.0.xml

listChange.change: Added series where applicable, as well as any known traits. Included some contibutors who were left out, though this is far from complete as far as anthologies and comics go.
Created this TEI version of the list using firstBooks2bibl.xsl
Last known revision of the Word document.
Created first version of this list in Microsoft Word.
